name: Kettle Beef
author: Leola Essner

ingredients.name: lb. roast, cut up in 2 inch cubes

instructions: Mix beef in bowl with flour, salt, pepper and onion until well coated. Put in a greased roasting pan with 1 cup of water. Bake at 400° for 30 minutes then turn oven down to 350° and bake for 3 hours. Check every hour to make sure it has enough water if needed. Add kitchen bouquet if needed when meat is done.
